alert.note: Alert for Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Carquinez Strait and Delta; Central Sacramento Valley; Motherlode; Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Northern San Joaquin Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County; Southern Sacramento Valley; West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 27 at 5:30PM PDT until October 29 at 2:00PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM SATURDAY TO 2 PM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northerly winds 20-30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph over the Sacramento Valley and Foothills. East to northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph or higher are possible over the Sierra at higher elevations and through gaps and canyons. * WHERE...Sacramento Valley, Northern San Joaquin Valley, the Sierra Nevada, and Southern Cascades. * WHEN...From 8 AM Saturday to 2 PM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A Red Flag Warning is in effect across portions of the advisory area. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
